movies.name: Iron Man
movies.plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

movies.name: The Incredible Hulk
movies.plot: Scientist Bruce Banner transforms into a powerful green creature known as the Hulk while on the run from the military.

movies.name: Iron Man 2
movies.plot: Tony Stark faces pressure from the government, rival industries, and a new villain while dealing with his declining health.

movies.name: Thor
movies.plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is banished to Earth and must learn what it takes to be a true hero.

movies.name: Captain America: The First Avenger
movies.plot: Steve Rogers volunteers for an experimental program and becomes the super-soldier known as Captain America, battling a Nazi organization called Hydra during World War II.

movies.name: The Avengers
movies.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes, including Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, Hulk, Black Widow, and Hawkeye, join forces to save the world from Loki and his alien army.

movies.name: Iron Man 3
movies.plot: Tony Stark battles a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin while dealing with his own personal demons.

movies.name: Thor: The Dark World
movies.plot: Thor teams up with his mischievous brother Loki to protect the universe from a dark elf and his destructive weapon.

movies.name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.plot: Captain America teams up with Black Widow and the Falcon to expose a conspiracy within S.H.I.E.L.D. while facing a powerful assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

movies.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.plot: A group of intergalactic misfits, including Star-Lord, Gamora, Drax, Rocket, and Groot, team up to save the galaxy from a powerful orb.

movies.name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
movies.plot: The Avengers must stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his plan to wipe out humanity.

movies.name: Ant-Man
movies.plot: A skilled thief named Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, protect the secret behind the Ant-Man suit from a new generation of threats.

movies.name: Captain America: Civil War
movies.plot: Captain America and Iron Man find themselves on opposite sides of a political conflict that splits the Avengers into two factions.

movies.name: Doctor Strange
movies.plot: Dr. Stephen Strange, a brilliant but arrogant neurosurgeon, discovers the mystical arts and becomes the Sorcerer Supreme, defending the Earth against supernatural threats.

movies.name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
movies.plot: The Guardians of the Galaxy embark on a journey to unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's parentage.

movies.name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.plot: Peter Parker balances his life as a high school student and his alter ego Spider-Man, facing a new threat known as the Vulture.

movies.name: Thor: Ragnarok
movies.plot: Thor finds himself imprisoned on the planet Sakaar and must assemble a team to stop the villainous Hela and prevent the destruction of Asgard.

movies.name: Black Panther
movies.plot: T'Challa, the king of Wakanda, rises to the throne and must defend his nation against a powerful enemy.

movies.name: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.plot: The Avengers and their allies must come together to stop the powerful Thanos from acquiring all the Infinity Stones and wiping out half of all life in the universe.

movies.name: Ant-Man and the Wasp
movies.plot: Scott Lang teams up with Hope van Dyne as the new Wasp on a mission to uncover secrets from their past while dealing with a new threat.

movies.name: Captain Marvel
movies.plot: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

movies.name: Avengers: Endgame
movies.plot: The Avengers and their allies gather one last time to reverse the devastating effects of Thanos' snap and restore balance to the universe.

movies.name: Spider-Man: Far From Home
movies.plot: Peter Parker goes on a school trip to Europe but is recruited by Nick Fury to help uncover the mystery of elemental creatures attacking the continent.

movies.name: Black Widow
movies.plot: Natasha Romanoff confronts the dark parts of her past when a dangerous conspiracy arises, forcing her to confront her past as a spy and the broken relationships left in her wake.

movies.name: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.plot: Shang-Chi must confront his past and take on the Ten Rings organization to protect the world from their sinister plans.

movies.name: Eternals
movies.plot: The Eternals, an immortal alien race, reunite to protect humanity from their ancient enemies, the Deviants.
